channel.title: Error Connecting to server please help
channel.description:
Alright so I have my server and client all working, and I can obviously access the game because i'm hosting it, therefore my internal IP can connect to it.
However, when somebody else tries to connect it says error connecting to server, I have no-ip installed correctly and everything I can't figure out what's wrong! Here is a picture of my port foward, just incase it's wrong. If anybody has any ideas please help?
http://img811.imageshack.us/f/43558715.png/
Thanks a lot!

item.title: Error Connecting to server please help
item.dc:creator: @IVIr_Infiniity IVIr Infiniity
item.description:
@IVIr_Infiniity wrote:

easiest way —>
download utorrent, go to prefrencess and change the port to 43594 and apply
close utorrent
run your server then open u torrent again, that will automaticly set the port to 43594. its alot eaiser

Read full topic
item.source: Error Connecting to server please help
